text: Curious about Tommy Lee Jones’ wife and kids? The veteran actor’s recent collaboration with Robert De Niro and Morgan Freeman, titled The Comeback Trail, recently received its video-on-demand release after a prolonged waiting period. Meanwhile, 1998’s crime thriller U.S. Marshals, featuring Jones and Robert Downey Jr., has also attracted increased streaming views in recent times. As such, fans of Lee Jones have expressed a heightened interest in his personal life, including details about his family. So, here’s everything you need to know regarding the Men in Black actor’s spouse, including her profession and their kids. Who is Tommy Lee Jones married to? Tommy Lee Jones is married to Dawn Laurel-Jones. The couple first met in 1995 on the set of The Good Old Boys. Tommy was making his television directorial debut with the film and was also starring in it. Meanwhile, Dawn served as an assistant camera operator on the project. At the time, he was still married to his second wife, Kimberlea Cloughley. However, following their separation, Tommy and Dawn began dating, and the duo attended their first red carpet event as a couple in 1998. The pair ultimately tied the knot in a private ceremony in Alamo Heights, Texas, on March 19, 2001, and have progressed steadily ever since. What is Dawn Laurel’s job? Dawn Laurel-Jones previously worked as a camera operator. While Tommy Lee Jones’ wife has remained absent from the industry since 2014, she used to work behind the camera during her active years. Dawn specialized in multiple roles, serving as an assistant camera operator, stills photographer, and camera loader. She has worked on the sets of multiple movies, including Back to the Future Part II and RoboCop 2. Dawn also picked up polo after marrying Tommy and has developed impressive skills in the sport ever since. In an earlier interview with The New Yorker, the actor noted that his partner was “one of the best women polo players in the country.” How many kids do Tommy Lee Jones and Dawn Laurel have? Tommy Lee Jones and his wife, Dawn Laurel-Jones, do not have any children of their own. However, Dawn Laurel is a stepmother to Tommy’s two children, Austin and Veronica, whom he shares with his ex-wife, Kimberlea Cloughley.
